betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Gallium is a extremly important metal. This one is used for lots of electrical components, so kinda important.

To obtain Gallium there are a couple of ways to obtain it this early.
§6
The first way is to electrolyse Sphalerite Dust to obtain it at a 5 percent chance. 
Sphalerite comes from the Nether!
§a
A slightly better way to produce some is to use the Coal Slurry route. 
Simply mix Crushed Coal in a mixer with some Aqua Regia to prodruce Coal Slurry then centrifuge it!
Yes the gallium has a 2% chance this route 3% less than Sphalerite but Coal is way more easier to obtain!
